attributes.action: Stop the website www.newsallangles.com/cricforum being a dictatorship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
mr gordon brown, could u please join forces with your buddy george, to unban everyone on newsallangles.com/cricforum

i want u to unban afridi666, shanestalker, indianfromchennai, manali and lots of other people.

as this is a period of uncertainty in the labour camp, i suggest u agree, or my vote will be for ME

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
